name: Screen Ruler
description: ScreenRuler will display a ruler on screen which allows you to measure the other objects that you've there. It has the following features: * Horizontal and vertical measurement in 6 different metrics: pixels, centimetres, inches, picas, points, and as a percentage of the ruler's length. * Cusomizable colors and fonts. * Keyboard control for precise positioning. * Option for the ruler to stay always on top of other windows.
